content.rendered:
Directed by Arun Gopy.

Written by Sachy.

Cast Dileep(Adv. Ramanunni). Prayaga Martin(Helena). Radhika Sarathkumar(Ragini Raghavan). Kalabhavan Shajohn(Thomas Chacko aka T.C.). Mukesh(Paulson Devassy). Siddique(Udayabhanu). Suresh Krishna(Chandran). Renji Panicker(V.G. Madhavan). Lena(Olga John). Anil Murali(Sudhi) . Ashokan(Inspector General of Police).Bindhu Jayan. Shaju K.S.(Prakashan). Sasi Kalinga(Villager). Vinod Kedamangalam(Pushpan). G. Suresh Kumar(Sagar (as Suresh Kumar)). Salim Kumar(Sumesh Venjara). Majeed(Govt. Representative). Tommichan Mulakupadam(Self). Ameer Niyas(Deepak). Chali Pala(Soman). Alexander Prasanth(Villager). Abhishek Raveendran(Room Boy). Sreejith Ravi(Sibi Chacko). Sadiq(Rajendran). Saikumar(Minister). Adinad Sasi(Villager). Manju Satheesh(Ragini’s Friend). Unnikrishnan(Police Officer). Vijayaraghavan(Ambadi Mohanan)

Language Malayalam.

Producers Tommichan Mulakupadam.

Production Mulakuppadam Films.
